title: Dua Lipa picks out pumpkins with her new beau Anwar Hadid during couple's trip to the grocery store
text:
They went public with their fledgling romance back in July.

And now, from the looks of things, it appears Dua Lipa and beau Anwar Hadid have taken their relationship to the next level when they got a jump on Halloween.

The pair were spotted moments after buying a couple of pumpkins, and other assorted holiday items, at a grocery store in Los Angeles on Thursday.

In the season: Anwar Hadid and ladylove Dua Lipa got a jump on Halloween and bought a couple of pumpkins, and other assorted holiday items, on Thursday

The male model, who's the younger brother of high-profile models Gig and Bella Hadid, went with his usual disheveled look dressed in black sweatpants that were rolled up to his knees to reveal some of his body art.

Leading the charge of of the store, he also wore a grey hoodie over a green t-shirt and black sneakers.

The 20-year-old also pulled the hood over his dyed blonde and pink hair for his walked to their car with bags in both of his hands.

Casual wear: The male model went with his usual disheveled look dressed in black sweatpants and a grey hoodie with the hood over his dyed blonde and pink hair; the English singer wore a black skirt and a black and aqua-blue pullover

Following close behind with a pumpkin in each arm, Lipa showed off her legs in a csual black skirt.

She paired it with a black and aqua-blue pullover and black sneakers.

For the afternoon jaunt, the Grammy-winning singer, 24, wore her dyed blonde tresses long and straight and with a part in the middle.

Newbies: The couple first sparked serious romance rumors when they were seen packing on the PDA while attending a UK music festival over Fourth of July weekend

The couple first sparked serious romance rumors when they were seen packing on the PDA while attending a UK music festival over Fourth of July weekend.

TMZ reported that 'things really started to snowball around early June when Hadid found out Lipa, who's friends with his sister Gigi, had split from her beau and 'reached out for a date.'

The couple have been very open with heir newfound love and have been photographed together a number of times in the proceeding months.
description: Dua Lipa got leggy in a skirt and Anwar Hadid keep things casual in sweats, when they got a jump on Halloween and bought two pumpkins together in Los Angeles on Thursday.
